DataElement.preferredName: MAX-PC 7 How True Past Week Unintended Prostate Cancer Thoughts Score 4 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Persons' stated observation of how true in the past week they thought about prostate cancer even when they didn't mean to, using a four point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Modified 18-Item Memorial Anxiety Scale for Prostate Cancer How True Past Week Thought about Prostate Cancer Even Though Didn't Mean To Frequency Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An 18-item questionnaire designed to facilitate the identification and assessment of men with prostate cancer-related anxiety._A question about an individual's agreement with a statement._The most recent week, including today._A question about how frequently an individual thinks or thought about prostate cancer even when they didn't mean to._The number of occurrences of something within a given time period._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Modified 18-Item Memorial Anxiety Scale for Prostate Cancer
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition:
An 18-item questionnaire designed to facilitate the identification and
assessment of men with prostate cancer-related anxiety.

Concepts.longName: Modified 18-Item Memorial Anxiety Scale for Prostate Cancer
Concepts.definition: An 18-item questionnaire designed to facilitate the identification and assessment of men with prostate cancer-related anxiety.

Property.preferredName: How True Past Week Thought about Prostate Cancer Even Though Didn't Mean To Temporal Frequency Score
Property.preferredDefinition: A question about an individual's agreement with a statement.:The most recent week, including today.:A question about how frequently an individual thinks or thought about prostate cancer even when they didn't mean to.:The number of occurrences of something within a given time period.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A question about an individual's agreement with a statement.
The most recent week. May include the present day.

Concepts.longName: Thought about Prostate Cancer Even Though Didn't Mean To
Concepts.definition: A question about how frequently an individual thinks or thought about prostate cancer even when they didn't mean to.
The number of occurrences of something within a given time period.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard related to the frequency an individual experiences something as measured by the MAX-PC scale.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer that something occurs frequently.

Concepts.definition: On many occasions, or in many situations.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

Concepts.definition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Added "Sometimes" to represent the MSAS value domain.ghd.01.27.15

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of no agreement or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.
